PICOs.Population: Adult patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) presenting the KRAS G12C mutation, previously treated
PICOs.Outcomes: Objective response rate, safety profile, incidence of adverse events

PICOs.Population: Patients with advanced solid tumors with KRAS G12C mutation
PICOs.Outcomes: Objective response rate evaluated by an independent review committee

PICOs.Comparator: No direct comparator mentioned, observational study
